string.value:
The 2nd Monster Carnival, a festival that welcomes true fighters!
The party that acquires more CP (points earned by hunting monsters) in 10 minutes wins. Face even the strongest party by using CP to distract the opponents through Skill, Monsters, and Protectors.

 - #eTime Restriction#n : 10min
 - #eBattlefield#n 
 1) Field 1 : 2 ~ 4 players, Low Difficulty Level
 2) Field 2 : 2 ~ 4 players, Medium Difficulty Level
 3) Field 3 : 3 ~ 6 players, High Difficulty Level
 - #eFinal Reward#n : #b#i1122058# #t1122058##k
 (Collect 150 #t04001254#
 to receive reward from #p2042000#)

Prove your strength in the 2nd Monster Carnival! You can acquire #b#t1122058##k from #r#t04001254##k. 
#eHistory#n
 #b#jtry# #k Battles (Forfeit #r#jgvup# #k times) 
 #r #jvic# #k Wins #r #jlose# #k Losses #r #jdraw# #k Ties
 #b#i1122058# #t1122058# #k #r #jhave# #k
 Result
 #b #jrank# #k RANK 


#eSummary#n 
The 2nd Monster Carnival, a festival that welcomes true fighters!
The party that acquires more CP (points earned by hunting monsters) in 10 minutes wins. Face even the strongest party by using CP to distract the opponents through Skill, Monsters, and Protectors.

Establish a strong bond with your party members by participating in the 2nd Monster Carnival. For optimal results, each party member must actively participate and contribute to the party.
#e#eHistory#n
 #b#jtry# #k Battles (Forfeit #r#jgvup# #k times) 
 #r #jvic# #k Wins #r #jlose# #k Losses #r #jdraw# #k Ties
 #b#i1122058# #t1122058# #k #r #jhave# #k
 Results
 #b #jrank# #k RANK

The 2nd Monster Carnival, a festival that welcomes true fighters!
The party that acquires more CP (points earned by hunting monsters) in 10 minutes wins. Face even the strongest party by using CP to distract the opponents through Skill, Monsters, and Protectors.
